task.PuzzleSolver.description: Automatically solve puzzle mini-games for you. No need to think anymore!
option.PuzzleSolverMode.label: Mode
option.PuzzleSolverMode.description:
- Single Run: Task ends automatically after successfully solving once
- Loop: Repeat solving until manually stopped
- Demo Only: Does not actually solve, only demonstrates steps (you'll still need to solve it yourself)
option.PuzzleSolverMode.cases.Loop.label: Loop
